subject: ORDER #SSN6218
description_text:
I ordered to the wrong address, is there a way we can change delivery
address or cancel order so I can replace to the the correct address?

Thank you,
Lincoln Green

conversations.body_text: Hi lincoln green,  ​We have intercepted your express delivery for you. Please provide the correct address as soon as possible.

Hi, thank you for your swiftness.
The correct address is,
106 Pine st apt 1, Plattsburgh, NY 12901

Thank you again,
Lincoln Green

On Sun, Jan 18, 2026 at 10:47 PM service@simsonn.com
